hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Forest Temple Small Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Green Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the path to #Volvagia#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key# can be found in #Goron City#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #storm in the valley# reveals #Dampé's Grave#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #2# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Nocturne of Shadow# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: Hoot! Hoot! Would you like me to repeat that?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.
